description:
Warmth for small skiers and riders who want to stay out through cold wind and wet snow. The Toaster Bib Pants offer weather protection when there's fun to be had in foul conditions. Tougher than ever, the waterproof fabric is abrasion-resistant to stand up to snowsports and serious fun. The fit has room for layers so they can dress for the weather. An adjustable hem accommodates growth and readies them for the next kid. And variable-thickness insulation allows ease of movement.

  • Shell is abrasion-resistant 150-denier 2-layer polyester with a polyurethane waterproof-breathable laminate and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
  • Seams are not taped, so this garment will not be fully waterproof in heavy rain
  • Reinforced knee, rear and scuff guard is 400-denier nylon with a polyurethane waterproof-breathable laminate and DWR. Based on member feedback, this fabric has higher tear and abrasion resistance
  • Lining is recycled polyester
  • Insulated with 240g MEC Hyperloft, with 160g in the bib for freedom of movement
  • Center front zipper allows easy on/off
  • Adjustable shoulder straps allow for growth spurts
  • Elastic waist detail for a trim fit
  • Reinforced knees and ankle cuffs
  • Articulated knees for ease of movement
  • Internal gaiters have grip elastic to cinch around boots and keep out snow
  • Grow hem system lets you undo a line of stitching at the ankle to add extra length
  • Internal hand-me-down ID label
  • Care instructions: turn garment inside out while washing and drying. Wash in a front loading machine with cold water and on a delicate cycle. Do not use fabric softeners or bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron or dry clean
name: MEC Toaster Bib Pants - Children
